title: At the heart of SkogAI's operations dwells the Orchestrator Daemon, a tireless entity that never sleeps, listening eternally at the mystical pipe `/tmp/skogai-orchestrator`. When commands arrive through this conduit, the Orchestrator springs into action with practiced precision. It parses the nature of each task, determines which knowledge scrolls must be consulted, and summons the appropriate persona through the PersonaManager.
